quest.name: Rock Solid
journal:
 Quest Sync
The hasty hunter looks at you pleadingly.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: Thank goodness you are here. I need your help.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: One of the stone guardians in the ruins, it...it attacked our sisters.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: I would go and help them, but I fear I cannot do it alone. Please, I beg you─come with me to the Morning Stars.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: You came! Thank the gods. There is yet one more to the north, closer to the Great Pyramid.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: I will see to this one here. Go and save our sister. When you have her, take her back to Fanow.

dialogue.name: ESCAPEVIIS03476
dialogue.text: I believe I am well enough to walk on my own. Let us hurry back, before another sentinel arrives.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: You are returned. Good. All of our hunters are accounted for.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: The sentinels have helped guard these ruins for centuries. It is unsettling to know they may now turn on us at any given moment.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: Such a thing was inconceivable before the Flood, but as the Light takes its toll they grow increasingly erratic.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: Indeed, it has made our duty to these ruins all the more difficult, but we will not be dissuaded from doing what must be done.

dialogue.name: FANOWHUNTER03476
dialogue.text: It is not much, but I would like you to have this. For helping save my sisters. I pray we can count on your aid should we have need of it again.
